sub_title: CHN→NZ→NL, my life has been one big data-driven adventure. Data isn't just a passion, it's my essence. And as I journey through the world, art becomes the canvas on which I paint my experiences. 🌏📊🎨
summary:
Experienced in Data and in Networks, I'm a fully bilingual (English and Chinese) communicator with strong people skills that I've built up working across cultures in New Zealand and China.  Comfortable working under pressure, and can work effectively in a team or autonomously.  Have recently moved to the Netherlands, and keen to continue my data journey here.

Experienced in IT with excellent communicative abilities and strong people skills obtained in a large multinational IT company.  Strive working under pressure, and equally comfortable in big teams and working autonomously.  Fluent in English and Chinese.  Now looking to further develop my people-focused and technical abilities in a new environment.

profile_positions.description:
- Overseeing the creation of the regional senior leadership company reporting package, summarizing financial and operational performance for different periods, including actuals and forecasts.
- Leading and coordinating multiple improvement initiatives related to our EPM financial software suite EPBCS/HFM, SAP/BPC and data management and financial modelling and forecasting
- Assisting with forecasting, annual operating budget for Regional business entities within the operating warehouse and transport segments, including loading data to HFM/EPBCS and structuring management presentations.
- Working closely with stakeholders in the business to secure on-time and on-point delivery of all reports and data analysis packages and work diligently in managing expectations whilst being able to spar with and challenge your colleagues in delivering.
- Taking part in the month end close process, variance explanations, and researching and reviewing financial results.
- Collaborating with the Financial Control team on deliverables in relation to delivery on SOX (Sarbanes-Oxley) controls and other requirement.
- Performing other special projects and duties on time and quality point whilst managing the process and internal stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: FP&A Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Translating business requirements into analytical solutions within FMCG domain, drive data quality through collaboration across cultures, time zones and functions, including Sales, Marketing, Strategy, Finance, Customer Support and Supply Chain.
- Modelling and visualizing data into insightful business reports and interactive dashboards to enable data driven statistical efficiency and business decision making.
- Leading and supporting various business projects such as Forecast Planning, SKU Deletion, Competitors Research, Pricing Analysis, Category Portfolio Review, Budget Building, NDPs health analysis, Promotion analysis.
- Consolidating and analyzing internal sales-in data and external sales-out data across various markets, including EUR, NZ, CHN, AU, USA, UAE, JPN and SEA.
- Collaborating with various business partners for sales and marketing reports, including Amazon, Costco, Alibaba Tmall, JD, Reformhaus, Rossman.
profile_positions.title: Global Sales Data Analyst

profile_positions.description: My first role in New Zealand, I was able to bring my English level up to effectively native level by working  at this busy call center as a bilingual customer care agent.  A highlight was securing a $200,000 NZD donation for a refurbished ambulance, by personally cultivating a relationship with a highly valued customer.
profile_positions.title: Bilingual Customer Support Agent

profile_positions.description:
- Actively monitoring the performance of, and performing Tier 1 troubleshooting on the following: IT infrastructure, facilities, applications and services of Active Network (including network, backup & storage, cloud services, Data Centres, customer facing products, development environment etc)
- Consistently and effectively managing (in English only) a complex flow of incoming calls and emails from a variety of sources – internal (support) and external (customers and vendors). Proactively reaching out to third parties to ascertain root cause for any issues. 
- Proactively managing the incident management process and ensuring SLAs are always adhered to, including the company-wide critical process of sending out timely notifications timely to the company and our customers
profile_positions.title: Network Operation Center Analyst
